question: List the top 3 movies with a released date on a Friday.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE date(m.released).weekday = 5
RETURN m.title, m.released
ORDER BY m.released DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Uses weekday function which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: Find all users who rated a movie on its release date.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:RATED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.released = date(datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}))
RETURN u, r, m
error: Uses epochSeconds which requires timestamp conversion

question: What are the top 5 movies with the highest IMDb rating that have been directed by the same director?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director)
WITH d, m
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
WITH d, collect(m)[0..5] AS topMovies
RETURN d.name AS director, [movie IN topMovies | movie.title] AS movies, [movie IN topMovies | movie.imdbRating] AS ratings
error: Uses collect() aggregation which has no direct TypeQL equivalent

question: List the first 3 users who rated a movie on its release day.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:RATED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.released = date(datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}))
RETURN u.name AS user, m.title AS movie, m.released AS releaseDate
ORDER BY r.timestamp
LIMIT 3
error: Uses epochSeconds which requires timestamp conversion

question: What are the top 5 movies with the smallest gap between release and rating date?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, r, u, datetime(m.released) AS releasedDate, datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}) AS ratingDate
WITH m, duration.between(releasedDate, ratingDate).days AS daysBetween
ORDER BY daysBetween
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, daysBetween AS daysBetweenReleaseAndRating
error: Uses duration functions which have no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the first 3 movies with a director who has a bio longer than 500 words?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director)
WHERE size(split(d.bio, ' ')) > 500
RETURN m.title
LIMIT 3
error: Uses size(split()) which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the top 5 movies with the most user ratings received in their first year of release?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WHERE datetime(m.released).year = datetime(r.timestamp).year
WITH m, count(r) AS ratingCount
ORDER BY ratingCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, ratingCount AS ratingsInFirstYear

question: Which 5 movies have the most quotes listed in their plots?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.plot IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.plot
ORDER BY size(split(m.plot, '"')) DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses size(split()) which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: Which actors have acted in movies that were released on their birthday?
cypher:
MATCH (actor:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(movie:Movie)
WHERE date(movie.released) = date(actor.born)
RETURN actor.name AS actor, movie.title AS movie, movie.released AS releaseDate

question: Identify directors who directed a movie in the year they were born.
cypher:
MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.year = d.born.year
RETURN d.name AS director, m.title AS movie, m.year AS year
error: Uses .year property accessor which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: List the top 5 movies that have a plot description longer than 100 words.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE size(split(m.plot, ' ')) > 100
RETURN m.title, m.plot
ORDER BY size(split(m.plot, ' ')) DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses size(split()) which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the top 5 movies released in the last 5 years?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.released IS NOT NULL AND date(m.released) > date() - duration('P5Y')
RETURN m.title, m.released, m.imdbRating
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses duration functions which have no TypeQL equivalent
